description: The Paris Air Show is one of the world’s largest aviation and defense showcases. But in this age of budget cuts, who's buying planes? Facebook now allows users to record videos through Instagram, challenging Vine. And Instagram videos are 15 seconds longer than its Twitter-backed rival.
byline: Sabri Ben-Achour, D Gorenstein, Christopher Werth, Kai Ryssdal, Adrienne Hill and Jeff Tyler
